text: Maria Azzopardi (born 24 April 1983) is a Maltese former footballer who played as a defender. She has been a member of the Malta women's national team. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Maltese women's footballers Category:Malta women's international footballers Category:Hibernians F.C. players
title: Maria Azzopardi
